caseTitle: Director General Emergency Rescue Service 1122, KPK, Peshawar v. Nizakat Ullah
tagline: Where an employee is to be removed from service, which action obviously carries a stigma with it, he is entitled to due process which includes fair opportunity to defend himself, cross-examine the witnesses and produce evidence in his defence. Further, he must be confronted with the material on the basis of which he has been issued show cause notice.
